1.content: Hello and welcome! Im your host, Les Bacon! Now usually i'd open with a joke but we are the quiz with a difference. Remember challenger you must pick the wrong answer to win! Now that you know what to do lets play How's About Them Apples! Here is your first question. What is 1 plus 1?
1.title: First question

11.content: Your wrong which means your right! Good choice and remember wrong is right! Here comes question number 2 (some of you may remember this person from Really Random Questions). Who thinks he is always right when he is always wrong?
11.title: Right or wrong

111.content: I really hate Jeremy Kyle he always thinks he's right when in reality he's a middle class twat! Here's your next question. Which of these is a character from the series Friends?
111.title: Friends

1111.content: Cartman isnt from Friends which means you've picked the right choice! Your getting the hang of this now! Here is your next question. What band recorded the song Black Night?
1111.title: Band

11111.content: Thats wrong which means your right! I'd also like to take this oppurtunity to say Ozzy Osbourne is a legend! Anyway next question. What country did the olympics take place in the year 2000?
11111.title: Olympics

111111.content: Yes it didnt take place there good choice! By the way has anyone seen my cat? No? Oh right get on with it... Ahem... Which of the following army ranks is higher: Captain or Seargent?
111111.title: Army

1111111.content: Captain is the right answer and it has nothing to do with ships! Oh well you've lost! Your prize is a £10 voucher to use at B&Q! And if you see my cat tell him to come here. Thanks for playing!
1111111.title: B&Q

1111112.content: Wrong answer! Your good at this! Heres one that might get you though. What takes longer, getting a council house (in Britain) or adopting a child from Africa?
1111112.title: Carr

11111121.content: Amazingly it DOES take longer to get a house! Isnt that wierd!? Well your prize for picking the right choice is a weekend break in Stoke-On-Trent! Remember to go armed!
11111121.title: Where?

11111122.content: Amazingly its quicker to get a child from Africa! Here is your next question. Which of these is also known as a jackass?
11111122.title: Jackass

111111221.content: For those of you who dont know what a Boobah is, its a really scary creature on a kids tv show. Next question. Which of these is a Metallica album?
111111221.title: Metallica

1111112211.content: Metallica rock and Death Magnetic is awesome and everyone should own it! You chose the right answer stuiped! Your prize is a slightly used toaster called Lee and he likes to make toast. Enough said.
1111112211.title: Lee

1111112212.content: Your wrong and I would just like to take this oppurtunity to say long live Metallica! Lets have another question. Which of these films stars Micheal Caine?
1111112212.title: Classic

11111122121.content: Just imagining Micheal Caine im a war film makes me laugh for some reason. Well done! Now then, which of these animals is a better swimmer?
11111122121.title: Swimming

111111221211.content: Correct!You are really...well...'smart'!Ok,which is a color?
111111221211.title: Squirrels

1111112212112.content: Yah!Another 60-120 seconds,oh,and that is 1-2 minutes,which is a very short time.Which is a Movie?

111111221211211.content: yay *sarcasticly* Ok,now,what is the definition of cat?

1111112212112111.content: Yes, a cat is an animal and yes, you have lost. Why? Because you picked the right answer! Yes, I know its strange. For that, your prize is a visit to a public toilet! Enjoy yourself!
1111112212112111.title: Animal

1111112212112112.content: Okay, your doing great, yay for you! Now, which of these was NOT a member of The Beatles?
1111112212112112.title: Beatles

11111122121121121.content:
Good job, John Lennon WAS a member of the Beatles!
Now, will someone get me a coffee?

...No?

Okay, on with the show then.
Let's see how you fare with this one!
What is the name of the new monkey species that was discovered in 2012?
11111122121121121.title: Monkeykeykies

111111221211211211.content:
That's wrong, which means you're right! Actually, the Concoonga monkey doesn't even exist and never did exist, Heheheh.

Now, what is the world's deadliest mushroom?
111111221211211211.title: Mushrooms

choices: Casually sip your tea as he steals all your stuff
1111112212112112111.content:
Wrong- er, right... uh, well you know.

What's the best thing to do when a maniac breaks into your house?
1111112212112112111.title: Maniac

11111122121121121111.content:
Oh no, that's what you should do when you get a break-in. You lose.

Your reward is this dirty pillow, and a bottle of Oxi-Clean. Happy cleaning!
11111122121121121111.title: Call the police

11111122121121121112.content:
Yeah, that's what I would do, too! Except I'd be sipping coffee, not tea.
But apparently that's not the best course of action so that means you're wrong/right/yeah.

Alright, Bob has two apples. If I steal one, how many apples are left?
11111122121121121112.title: Bob's Apples

111111221211211211121.content:
Ha! That was a trick question! HAHAHA!! I didn't eat the apple, so it's still there!
Congratulations- or progratulations, because I think that's the opposite of congratulations, for getting it right though.

But wait, you're not leaving home empty-handed! Here, take this: My ex-wife's restraining order! Do whatever you want with it. I recommend throwing it away.
111111221211211211121.title: Restraining Order

111111221211211211122.content:
Yes, well no but you get it! I never said I ate it so you were wrong *laughs*.

Alright moving on to the next question, what is my favorite red color?

1111112212112112111222.content: Haha, that's correct! On to the next one. What is the opposite of opposite?
1111112212112112111222.title: Yellow!

1111112212112112112.content:
Good job, but you got it right so bad job. As a reward, you get 1,000,000 dollars! (Just don't spend it or you'll get arrested. It's counterfeit money!)

Thanks for playing!

...Can I please have my coffee now?
1111112212112112112.title: You're a MILLIONAIRE! ...Wait, nevermind.

111111221211211212.content: Correct! The monkey's name is Lesula! But since you were right, that means your game is now over. As a reward, you get an extremely tiny model of the white house! Also, it's made of chocolate. Enjoy!
111111221211211212.title: White Chocolate

11111122121121122.content: Your right, Jimmy Page was a member of Led Zeppelin. You've lost by the way, as you chose the right answer! I thought you would have learnt by now! Oh well, your prize is a visit from an Elvis impersonator called Steve.
11111122121121122.title: Steve

111111221211212.content: Ooh.Sorry.Here is a...*picks up a random rock* $1,000,000,000,000,000,000 rock*not really*.You 'rock'!Game over also.
111111221211212.title: Gone.Poof

11111122121122.content: *Cries**laughs* sorry your out.But you get 1 dollhair.Oh...here.the longest on earth.(measure 2cm long,in exact length,haha)If you see my BFF's cat,tell 'im to go to her.buh bye!
11111122121122.title: Freakey Friday

111111221212.content: Your right and yet your wrong, if you know what I mean! Otters are amazing though, I just love them! So then, here is your prize for losing. Its a 30 second trolly dash around your local supermarket! Of course you have to pay for it, im not rich you know! The cheek of some people...
111111221212.title: Dashing

11111122122.content: Your only suppossed to blow the bloody doors off! What an amazing and very Brittish film! But alas, you have lost and we must say goodbye to you. But you do get a consolation prize! Its a slightly used coconut from France! Enjoy!
11111122122.title: Okay then!

111111222.content: I wonder why they call donkeys jackasses? Anxway you've lost and your prize is whatever. No really its great and you know, whatever.
111111222.title: Whatever

111112.content: Yes and it was held in sydney to be precise. Wrong choice by the way you've lost the game. Your prize for trying hard is a big fluffy pink hat as modelled by Simon Cowwel!
111112.title: Hat

11112.content: Yeah Deep Purple did record that awesome song which means you picked the right answer... Which means you've lost. Oh well thats life for you. You'll get over it. Your prize is a 1 call from a phonebox to a person of your choice. Of course your the one who has to pay for the call! Enjoy!
11112.title: Call

1112.content: Yes he is which means you've lost! Remember in this quiz the wrong answers are the right ones to pick! Its a bit confusing I know but you'll get used to it! Your prize is a 3 hour lecture on tile samples by Jeremy Paxman! I advise bringing a pillow.
1112.title: Paxman

112.content: Oh dear you picked the right answer which means you've lost. And I really hate Jeremy Kyle so I blame him for this. Oh well never mind your prize for trying is a Crazy Frog CD (if you want me to scratch it let me know).
112.title: The Frog

12.content: Oh how dissapointing! You picked the right answer which is the wrong thing to do in this quiz! But as in Really Random Questions you wont go home empty handed! Your prize for failing this early into the game is a picture of Eeamon Holmes having a barbeque! Thank you for playing and good night!
12.title: Eeamon

info.brief_description: Can you get all the questions wrong to win some random prizes?
info.description: Welcome to How's About Them Apples the quiz thats different from the others! To win simply pick the wrong answer! But remember this is a spin-off of Really Random Questions so expect some madness and some random prizes!
